name: Schrodinger's Mouse
description:
Schrodinger's Mouse:

Schrodinger's Mouse is a simple yet challenging puzzle platformer game, play as a mouse, collect all the gems and escape from alternate realities!

This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1.

Note:

The first few jumps are possible if you hold the space key, it might take a few tries

If you see gems stuck in the ground, try to refresh them by cycling through levels

We will have an updated version of the game when the game jam ends

Controls:

AD or Arrow Keys to move 

Space to jump, hold to jump higher

Click on the level you're not in to cycle to the next one

Credits:

Programming, Music - gearless_june

Level Design - Busy Hamster/Jeffrey

Art -  MIR 8X8 TILESET, Mousepack, 2D Pixel Art Portal Sprites, Boole and the Boulders, 2D Pixel Art RC Car Sprites
